snippet: The son of Equatorial Guinea's president has been put under formal investigation in France for money laundering, his lawyer said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: France Puts Equatorial Guinea Leader's Son Under Formal Investigation
headline.main: France Puts Equatorial Guinea Leader's Son Under Formal Investigation

lead_paragraph: The son of Equatorial Guinea's president has been put under formal investigation in France for money laundering, his lawyer said on Wednesday.
